text: Apollon Guiber von Greifenfels (born 31 May 1887, date of death unknown) was a Russian fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Russian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Russia Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Apollon Guiber von Greifenfels
